alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 4:15PM AKST until February 14 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of up to one inch per hour will continue across the Matanuska Valley, especially east of the junction of the Glenn and Parks Highways, through this evening. Visibility may drop as low as one quarter mile at times due to heavy snowfall. An additional 1 to 2 inches of snow is possible through the evening hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The combination of heavy snow and resuspended snow from vehicular traffic could severely reduce visibility. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
